data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schüepp, Christof, Olmi, Massimo (2012): Catalogue of the Dryinidae and Sclerogibbidae (Hymenoptera: Chrysidoidea) of Belize, with description of two new species. Zootaxa 3346: 51-63, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281515
